name: Two Swords (milessupshur)
description:
[DISCLAIMER] Two Swords requires two controllers to play and is only playable on Windows.

CONTROLS:

A- jump

B- attack

Left Trigger- slash stance

Right Trigger- stab stance

X- dash (unlocked in second fight)

Y- dash attack (unlocked in third fight)

SUMMARY:

Two Swords is a 10-minute, 2-player fighting game that follows a lifelong rivalry between childhood friends. Players fight three times at different ages and each duel impacts their character's life. With eight unique endings based on the winner of each battle, Two Swords provides an engaging and responsive narrative experience. The game's combat becomes more intricate as the characters age but remains straightforward and enjoyable. Two swords is a must-play for anyone looking for a short fighting game with a rich narrative.
